descript.abstract: This line data layer represents hydrography for Manitowoc County, Wisconsin in 2016. It is a feature class within the geodatabase, Manitowoc_HydroLine_2016.gdb.[Rivers, streams, and creeks in Manitowoc County. Features were delineated using Manitowoc County's 2010 digital orthophotograph.]
descript.purpose: This layer is intended for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. [The streams feature class was created primarily for cartographic use by Manitowoc County. It is not intended for legal or regulatory uses.]
descript.supplinf: Augmented original metadata with UW-Madison specific elements. [Manitowoc County makes no warranties or representations of any kind whatsoever, expressed or implied, about the accuracy or quality of any data set or its fitness for a particular purpose. All data sets are provided "as is" and the county and its co-producers will not, in any event, be liable in any way for consequential, direct, incidental, special, or any other damages in connection with use of any data set.]

Manitowoc County Land Records/GIS Office
[Acknowledgement of Manitowoc County is appreciated in products derived from these data.]

dataqual.logic: [The data set is topologically structured polygon data with nodes at all intersections.]
dataqual.complete: [Major linear water features visible on the county's 2010 digital orthophotographs are included in this layer.]

horizpa.horizpar: [The relative horizontal positional accuracy for lake boundaries is +/- 6 feet based on the scale of the orthos, but may be much greater in areas with heavy vegetation.]

citeinfo.title: Digital Orthophotography
citeinfo.othercit: Color photography obtained during leaf off conditions and when there was no snow on the ground in the spring of 2010. They were used to produce orthophotography at a 12-inch ground pixel resolution. Control for the project was collected using Airborne Global Positioning System and ground-based GPS technology.

srcinfo.srccontr: [Reference basemap to visually located water features.]

procstep.procdesc: [Water feature linework was originally created by Aero-Metric, Inc. as part of a 2000 digital orthophotography project. They were updated by Ayres Associates as part of a 2005 digital orthophotography project and by the Manitowoc County GIS Office after a 2010 digital orthophotography project. The dataset was converted from an Esri shapefile to a file geodatabase in 2011.]
Changed name of file from ‘STREAMS’ to Manitowoc_HydroLine_2016.gdb.
Exported original feature class into a new file geodatabase to maintain the original file format of the data and to conform to UW-Madison's data distribution plan.

mapproj.mapprojn: NAD 1983 HARN WISCRS Manitowoc County Feet

enttyp.enttypd: Streams, rivers, creeks, and drainage ditches judged to be major carriers of water.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

stdorder.fees: There is no charge for standard geographic data delivered by e-mail or FTP. There is a charge of $25 per disk for files provided on a CD or DVD.
